q_ch: 未完成的订单中，哪个订单完成的进度最快？
q_en: Which order has the fastest completion progress among the unfinished orders?
thought: To find the order with the fastest completion progress among the unfinished orders, we need to consider the orders that are not yet completed. We will calculate the completion progress based on the number of completed products versus the planned number of products. We will then sort the orders based on their completion progress in ascending order and select the order with the fastest completion progress.

sqls.command: SELECT o.id AS order_id, SUM(st.completed_number) AS total_completed_number, SUM(op.number) AS total_planned_number, SUM(st.completed_number) / SUM(op.number) AS completion_progress FROM orders o JOIN order_product op ON o.id = op.order_id JOIN sewing_tasks st ON op.id = st.order_product_id WHERE SUM(st.completed_number) < SUM(op.number) GROUP BY o.id ORDER BY completion_progress ASC LIMIT 1;
